item.title: 卫冕冠军凯尔特人队同意以破纪录的 61 亿美元出售球队
item.description: NBA 卫冕冠军波士顿凯尔特人队周四表示，已同意以 61 亿美元的价格出售给由私募股权公司 Symphony Technology Group 联合创始人威廉-奇肖姆（William Chisholm）领导的集团。【原文：The reigning NBA champion Boston Celtics have agreed to a $6.1 billion sale to a group headed by private equity firm Symphony Technology Group co-founder William Chisholm, the team said on Thursday.】

item.title: 白宫表示，学生贷款和佩尔助学金项目仍将由教育部管理
item.description: 白宫周四表示，学生贷款和佩尔助学金项目仍将由美国教育部负责管理，特朗普总统准备签署一项行政命令，旨在关闭这一联邦机构。【原文：Student loan and Pell grant programs will still be run by the U.S. Department of Education, the White House said on Thursday, as President Trump prepared to sign a executive order aimed at shutting down the federal agency.】

item.title: 美国参议院民主党人呼吁特朗普医疗保险提名人奥兹医生缴纳 40 万美元的逃税税款
item.description: 两位美国民主党参议员周四表示，被唐纳德-特朗普总统提名监督政府医疗保险和医疗补助健康计划的名医麦赫麦特-奥兹（Mehmet Oz）博士应承诺缴纳他所逃避的 40 多万美元的税款。【原文：Dr. Mehmet Oz, the celebrity physician nominated by President Donald Trump to oversee the government's Medicare and Medicaid health plans, should commit to paying over $400,000 in taxes he avoided, two Democratic U.S. Senators said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普政府将就驱逐问题做出回应，法官将权衡可能的违规行为
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府在周四面临一个最后期限，即在法官考虑官员们是否违反了他暂时阻止驱逐令的同时，对司法部门要求提供更多有关驱逐数百名委内瑞拉移民的细节做出回应。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration faced a deadline on Thursday to respond to a judicial request for more details on the deportation of hundreds of Venezuelan migrants as the judge considers whether officials violated his order temporarily blocking the expulsions.】

item.title: 美国农业部将投资高达 1 亿美元开展抗击禽流感项目
item.description: 美国农业部周四表示，它计划投资高达 1 亿美元的项目，帮助研究有助于防治禽流感的疗法和潜在候选疫苗。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture said on Thursday it plans to invest up to $100 million in projects that will help in research of therapies and potential vaccine candidates to help combat bird flu.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国公民格列兹曼被塔利班释放并返回美国
item.description: 一位知情人士告诉路透社记者，在美国人质特使亚当-博勒（Adam Boehler）与塔利班官员在喀布尔举行会谈之后，塔利班于周四释放了一名被关押在阿富汗两年多的美国公民。【原文：The Taliban on Thursday freed an American citizen who had been detained in Afghanistan for more than two years, following talks between U.S. hostage envoy Adam Boehler and Taliban officials in Kabul, a source briefed on the release told Reuters.】

item.title: GEO 集团与美国移民及海关执法局签署协议，将在密歇根州开设移民处理中心
item.description: 美国移民与海关执法局（U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement）和私营监狱运营商GEO集团（GEO Group）周四表示，双方已达成协议，将立即在密歇根州中部开设一个联邦移民处理中心。【原文：U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement and private prison operator GEO Group have brokered an agreement to open a federal immigration processing center immediately in central Michigan, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 2 月成屋销售意外增长
item.description: 随着供应量的增加将买家重新拉回市场，美国 2 月份的成屋销售意外增长，但经济不确定性的上升可能会限制成屋销售的进一步增长。【原文：U.S. existing home sales unexpectedly increased in February as rising supply pulled buyers back into the market, but rising economic uncertainty could limit further gains.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数小幅上升，劳动力市场保持稳定
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有增加，表明 3 月份劳动力市场保持稳定，但在贸易紧张局势加剧和政府大幅削减开支的情况下，劳动力市场的前景正变得暗淡。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased slightly last week, suggesting the labor market remained stable in March, though the outlook is darkening amid rising trade tensions and deep cuts in government spending.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数小幅上升，劳动力市场保持稳定
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有增加，表明 3 月份劳动力市场保持稳定，但在贸易紧张局势加剧和政府大幅削减开支的情况下，劳动力市场的前景正变得暗淡。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased slightly last week, suggesting the labor market remained stable in March, though the outlook is darkening amid rising trade tensions and deep cuts in government spending.】

item.title: 特朗普暂停进口关税后，美国公司竞相争取进口关税豁免
item.description: 业内专家表示，华盛顿对《美国-墨西哥-加拿大协定》（USMCA）所涵盖商品进口关税的临时宽免引发了寻求贸易协定豁免的美国公司激增。【原文：Washington's temporary relief for import tariffs on goods covered under the U.S.-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA) has triggered a spike in US companies seeking exemption under the trade deal, industry experts said.】

item.title: 特拉华州立法者在批评声中就公司法改革进行表决
item.description: 特拉华州的立法者预计将于本周四投票通过对该州公司法的全面改革，以保护其有利于商业的声誉，但反对者称该法案是对亿万富翁的恩赐。【原文：Delaware lawmakers are expected to vote to overhaul the state's corporate law on Thursday to protect its business-friendly reputation, but opponents have called the bill a giveaway to billionaires.】

item.title: 退伍军人事务部的调整扰乱了部分美国退伍军人的心理健康服务
item.description: 乔伊-科尔特斯（Joey Cortez）曾在美国空军服役 24 年，自 8 月份以来，他一直在等待退伍军人事务部的心理健康专家为他看病，但就在这时，他又经历了一次新的焦虑。【原文：Joey Cortez, who served 24 years in the U.S. Air Force, had been waiting since August to see a mental health specialist from the Department of Veterans' Affairs, when he experienced a fresh jolt of anxiety.】

item.title: 白雪公主》上映后饱受争议
item.description: 迪斯尼的《白雪公主》将于本周五上映，此前该片曾饱受争议，将这部重述 1937 年经典动画的影片拖入了文化战争的泥潭，对其票房表现构成了潜在威胁。【原文：Disney’s "Snow White" reaches theaters on Friday, after having been dogged by controversies that dragged the retelling of the 1937 animated classic into the culture wars, potentially threatening its box office performance.】

item.title: 拳击赢得 2028 年洛杉矶夏季奥运会参赛资格--国际奥委会
item.description: 本周四，国际奥委会全票通过将拳击列入 2028 年洛杉矶奥运会项目，结束了多年来人们对拳击运动奥运前景的怀疑。【原文：Boxing was included on Thursday in the Los Angeles 2028 Olympics programme after a unanimous vote from the International Olympic Committee, ending years of doubt over the sport's Olympic future.】

item.title: 拳击赢得 2028 年洛杉矶夏季奥运会参赛资格--国际奥委会
item.description: 本周四，国际奥委会全票通过将拳击列入 2028 年洛杉矶奥运会项目，结束了多年来人们对拳击运动奥运前景的怀疑。【原文：Boxing was included on Thursday in the Los Angeles 2028 Olympics programme after a unanimous vote from the International Olympic Committee, ending years of doubt over the sport's Olympic future.】

item.title: 美国寻求驱逐亲巴勒斯坦的乔治敦大学学生
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府拘留了一名在华盛顿乔治城大学（Georgetown University）学习的印度男子，并在认为他对美国外交政策造成危害后试图将其驱逐出境。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration has detained an Indian man studying at Washington's Georgetown University and is seeking to deport him after deeming him a harm to U.S. foreign policy, the student's lawyer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国寻求驱逐亲巴勒斯坦的乔治敦大学学生
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府拘留了一名在华盛顿乔治城大学（Georgetown University）学习的印度男子，并在认为他对美国外交政策造成危害后试图将其驱逐出境。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration has detained an Indian man studying at Washington's Georgetown University and is seeking to deport him after deeming him a harm to U.S. foreign policy, the student's lawyer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 批评特朗普的联邦调查局特工被控共享机密文件
item.description: 法庭文件显示，一名联邦调查局特工本周在纽约机场被捕，并被指控非法披露机密文件。【原文：An FBI agent who accused the bureau of political bias during Donald Trump’s first presidential term was arrested this week at a New York airport and charged with illegally disclosing confidential documents, court filings show.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州市长撤销因电影院放映《无主之地》而驱逐电影院的威胁
item.description: 迈阿密海滩市市长史蒂文-迈纳（Steven Meiner）周三表示，他放弃了因一家艺术影院放映奥斯卡获奖影片《没有别的土地》（No Other Land）而将其驱逐出城市地产的威胁。【原文：Miami Beach Mayor Steven Meiner said on Wednesday he dropped his threat to evict an art house cinema from city property for screening Oscar-winning "No Other Land," a film about the Israeli displacement of a Palestinian community in the Israeli-occupied West Bank.】

item.title: 白宫呼吁最高法院约束阻碍特朗普议程的法官
item.description: 白宫周三抨击 "激进 "的联邦法官，并呼吁美国最高法院对他们进行约束，唐纳德-特朗普总统及其盟友对曾作出不利于其政府裁决的法官的攻击不断升级。【原文：The White House blasted "activist" federal judges and called on the U.S. Supreme Court to rein them in on Wednesday as President Donald Trump and his allies escalated their attacks against judges who have ruled against his administration.】

item.title: 美国共和党议员对五角大楼可能进行的指挥权调整表示担忧
item.description: 在美国国会领导五角大楼监督委员会的两位共和党议员周三罕见地发表了一份联合声明，对特朗普政府可能对美军司令部进行的调整表示震惊。【原文：The top two Republican lawmakers who lead the Pentagon's oversight committees in the U.S. Congress issued a rare, joint statement on Wednesday expressing alarm about a potential shake-up in U.S. military commands by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 白宫称特朗普将签署命令关闭教育部
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周四签署一项行政命令，旨在关闭教育部，兑现竞选时的一项重要承诺。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will sign an executive order on Thursday that aims to shut down the Department of Education, fulfilling a key campaign pledge, the White House said in a fact sheet on the measure.】

item.title: 美国因变性政策暂停资助宾夕法尼亚大学
item.description: 白宫周三表示，特朗普政府已因宾夕法尼亚大学的变性体育政策而暂停向该校提供 1.75 亿美元的资助，这是其迫使学校与其政策保持一致的最新努力。【原文：The Trump administration has suspended $175 million in funding to the University of Pennsylvania over its transgender sports policies, the White House said on Wednesday, its latest effort to force schools to fall in line with its policies.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔：关税将推迟通胀进程，评估影响为时尚早
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提高关税将推迟今年在降低通胀方面取得的进展，但美联储的基本判断是，与关税相关的价格影响将是短暂的，很快就会在经济中发挥作用。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Wednesday that President Donald Trump's tariff increases would delay progress in bringing down inflation this year, but the Fed's base case is that tariff-related price impacts will be transitory, working through the economy quickly.】

item.title: 电子邮件称，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）麾下 DOGE 成员在美国国际开发署（USAID）担任高级职位
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封电子邮件，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）政府效率部的一名成员将在美国国际开发署（U.S. Agency for International Development）担任高级职务，而在该机构解散过程中发挥了重要作用的皮特-马洛克（Pete Marocco）将重返国务院。【原文：A member of Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency will take up a top role at the U.S. Agency for International Development, while Pete Marocco, who played a major role in the dismantling of the agency, will return to the State Department, according to an email seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 加州大学因预计特朗普削减开支而冻结招聘
item.description: 加利福尼亚大学校长周三表示，该校已在全系统范围内冻结招聘，并进行了额外的裁员，以努力减轻联邦资金大幅削减所带来的影响。【原文：The University of California has imposed a system-wide hiring freeze and made additional cuts, its president said on Wednesday, as part of efforts to try to mitigate the impact of sharp cuts in federal funding.】

item.title: 美国参议院民主党人要求撤销疾控中心的大规模解雇决定
item.description: 美国参议院七名民主党人周三要求唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府恢复他上任以来解雇的美国疾病控制和预防中心的所有员工。【原文：Seven U.S. Senate Democrats demanded on Wednesday that President Donald Trump's administration reinstate all of the employees it fired from the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention since he took office.】

item.title: 美国高端妓院网络头目被判入狱四年
item.description: 本周三，大波士顿地区和华盛顿郊区一家高档妓院网络的经营者被判处四年监禁，该妓院的数百名顾客包括政客、公司高管、律师和军官。【原文：The operator of a high-end brothel network in the greater Boston area and the suburbs of Washington, whose hundreds of customers included politicians, corporate executives, lawyers and military officers, was sentenced on Wednesday to four years in prison.】

item.title: 参议院民主党人敦促特朗普撤销联邦贸易委员会的解雇决定
item.description: 二十多位美国民主党参议员周三呼吁唐纳德-特朗普总统撤销解雇美国联邦贸易委员会两位民主党成员的决定。【原文：More than two dozen Democratic U.S. senators called on President Donald Trump on Wednesday to rescind his termination of the two Democratic members of the U.S. Federal Trade Commission.】
